summary: Provides a complete baseline implementation for training, evaluating, and testing graph neural network models (GCN, GIN, with optional virtual nodes) on the OGB PCQM4M quantum chemistry dataset using DGL and PyTorch, including data handling, model definition, configurable training loops, checkpointing, logging, and inference scripts.
business_intent: Enables researchers and competition participants to quickly benchmark and develop GNN approaches for large‑scale molecular property prediction, facilitating reproducible experiments and submissions to the PCQM4M Large‑Scale Challenge.
